it.ppm.codebookmodel
Class CodeBook

java.lang.Object
  it.ppm.codebookmodel.CodeBook

public class CodeBook
extends java.lang.Object

This class represent a pixel during learnig's state.This class is codeword's list.

Method Detail

add

public void add(float[] new_vm,
                float[] new_aux)
Add a new element with the specified parameters(codeword).

Parameters:
new_vm - is a vector of 3 elements,represent the RGB's compnent of pixel's color.
new_aux - is a vector of 6 elements that represent: -the min brightness that the codeword accepted -the max brightness that the codeword accepted -the frequency with which the codeword has occurred -the maximun negative run-lenght defined as the longhest interval during the "Learning" state that the codeword has not recurred -the first that the codeword has occurred -the last that the codeword has occurred

update

public void update(int index,
                   float[] vm,
                   float[] aux)
Update a codeword.

Parameters:
index - index at which the specified codeword is to be modified.
vm - is a vector of 3 elements,represent the RGB's compnent of pixel's color.
aux - is a vector of 6 elements that represent: -the min brightness that the codeword accepted -the max brightness that the codeword accepted -the frequency with which the codeword has occurred -the maximun negative run-lenght defined as the longhest interval during the "Learning" state that the codeword has not recurred -the first that the codeword has occurred -the last that the codeword has occurred

Returns the number of point belonging to the list.

Returns:
the number of point belonging to the list(is is greater than zero)
